Activity: Arrive at work. Check news websites.
Address any urgent user inquiries or follow-up questions received overnight. Prioritize based on severity and impact.
Revise the SOP based on feedback from @HIS-1 and @HIS-2. Incorporate suggestions for clarification, efficiency, and compliance.
Develop a communication plan for informing users about the new support channels and the online help desk portal. This could include email announcements, website updates, and internal newsletters.
Work on setting up email auto-responses and canned responses within the chosen ticketing system. This will help provide quicker replies to common inquiries.
Lunch Break. Get out of the office.
Prepare a presentation for the rest of the team to demonstrate the new ticketing system and the support process. Schedule the meeting with @ITPM-1 for next week. @ITPM-1 Ticketing System Demo
Continue creating training materials for users, focusing on creating video tutorials that visually demonstrate how to submit tickets, access the knowledge base, and troubleshoot common issues.
Refine the system for tracking response times to user inquiries. Ensure the system is accurately capturing data and generating reports that can be used to monitor performance.

Reach out to @EHRV-1 to discuss potential integrations between the ticketing system and the EHR system. This could help streamline the support process and provide more context for troubleshooting. @EHRV-1 Ticketing System Integration
Review the day's progress, organize notes, and plan for tomorrow's tasks.
